formElement.label: Xen Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for Xen. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Number Of Machines:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual machines to create resources. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to create the resource.

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/Xen/vms).

formElement.label: Results Tag:
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this execution (default is $[jobStepId]).

formElement.label: Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.

formElement.label: Resource Pool(s):
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created(Space separated list).

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
